title: Avl AUG 1 - Handsome FURNISHED 1+br - All UTILS INCL! Walk Central T!
neighborhood: MID-CAMBRIDGE, a block from City Hall
posting_body: ['***CALL Mari at 617-492-6368***', 'Please No Texting :-)', 'See My Listings at:', '<URL>', 'Charles River Properties, Cambridge', '***FULLY-FURNISHED CONDO*** Avl AUGUST 1', '.', 'Avl up to a year (+).', 'Walk ~7 minutes to Central T!', 'Elegant comfort in this turnkey 2nd floor 1+ bedroom condo', ', convenient to Harvard and MIT!', 'All utilities included', ': heat, water, electricity, wifi, cooking gas.', 'All linens and full kitchenware', 'included.', 'Regular housekeeping', 'twice/monthly avl $150/mo.', 'On Harvard Street at Bigelow Street, one block from City Hall', ', with view of the city Hall steeple.', 'Two blocks to Whole Foods, near many restaurants and shopping.', 'In a vintage professionally-managed elevator building', 'built in 1929.', 'High ceilings, oak hardwoods,', 'ambiance fireplace', ', graceful arched portals, southwest exposure.', 'Built-in desk', ', separated dining area.', 'Carefully-coordinated furnishings and artwork.', 'Fully-equipped kitchen', 'with gas range, built-in microwave, dishwasher, disposal, dinnerware, cookware, etc.', 'Queen-sized bed', '.', 'Flat-panel 32" TV and Sonos wireless music system.', 'All sheets, towels, bedding included.', 'Full bath.', 'A/C. Laundry facilities and storage in building.', 'Sorry, no pets.', 'Video avl.', 'Broker Fee: negotiable']
